title: Modular Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program for Engineering Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering mathematics (linear algebra, calculus) and experience solving engineering problems
context.additional_context: Mobile device-based learning, 10-minute modular design, and case-centered content applicable to work settings

learning_goals: Learners can solve over 70% of real workplace problems using modular engineering mathematics concepts.
Learners achieve over 85 points in module evaluations (quizzes/assignments) every 4 weeks.
Learners can explain 3+ strategies for solving complex engineering problems through intermodular linked learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
